title: patching error
body:
hey i just launched the game to play and it patches then keeps saying patching error and when i restart the client it wont go away. 
the error is http://imgur.com/a/xEL7f

replies.body: oh it turned out i didnt have enough space on my harddrive. i deleted some stuff and the patching went fine

During patching the client is very sensitive. Permissions need to be set properly and connection needs to be healthy or problems can happen. 3rd party programs are notorious for taking up system resources and other programs can cause the client to be unstable (antiviruses are the popular option along with certain gaming software).

Follow the steps in this article and it should fix your issue: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions
